The ocean-like assembly in this Dharma assembly, hearing your vows, gives rise to joy,

O Buddha's disciples!
In the great forest of jeweled flower branches, another Buddha appeared, named:
Renowned Lotus Flower Eyes Banner.
At that time, Great Light, having passed away from there, was born in the heavenly city of Peaceful Jeweled Palace on Mount Sumeru, becoming a great heavenly king named:
Flawless Meritorious Virtue Banner. Together with the heavenly multitudes, he went to where the Buddha was, raining clouds of jeweled flowers as offerings.

At that time, the heavenly king multitudes, having heard this sutra, attained samadhi, named:
Universal Gate of Joyful Treasury.
